U

ui - package ui
 
ui - Variable in class dataClass.ProgramCore
Field for holding the UI.
UI - Class in ui
A base class that all UserInterfaces must extend (Human <-> Computer communication) The UI will be constructed by a Core class, which will call the UI.start() command, when the core is ready for User interaction.
UI(Core) - Constructor for class ui.UI
Checks if the core is alive
updateSeason(String, boolean) - Method in class dataClass.Course
Update the period/semester data for the course.
UserDatabase - Class in databases
Handles the saving and loading of StudyPlans.
UserDatabase() - Constructor for class databases.UserDatabase
Constuctor
UserDatabaseTest - Class in test
This test class runs a series of tests on the class UserDatabase using jUnit
UserDatabaseTest() - Constructor for class test.UserDatabaseTest
 
userDB - Variable in class dataClass.ProgramCore
Field for the UserDatabase, used to save and load StudyPlans to and from the HDD.
usr - Variable in class test.UserDatabaseTest
Sets up the class variable usr
